text: LG G6 is a smartphone developed by LG Corporation. It was announced on 26 February 2016. It was released on 7 April 2016. == Features == LG G6 has 3300mAh battery capacity, 5MP selfie camera, 13MP ultrawide and standard back camera, 4GB RAM, Qualcomm Snapdragon 821, 32GB and 64GB storage, 18W wired charger, wireless charger for United States only, USB-C 3.1 and 5.7 inch 18.9 aspect ratio IPS LCD screen. == Software == LG G6 run Android 7.0 Nougat for the first time, it can upgrade other versions like Android 8.0 Oreo and Android 9.0 Pie when they came out. It is has spilt screen apps. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2016 Category:Android smartphones Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras Category:LG mobile phones
title: LG G6
